MetaData.MetaDataItem: 1. Set the controller in inclusion mode 2. Push the up and down for 3 seconds. Move in this menu by pushing up while the left led is green. Hit door close button. Right LED will flash GREEN indicating readiness to include.

1. Set the controller in exclusion mode 2. Push the up and down for 3 seconds. Move in this menu by pushing up while the left led is green. Hit door close button. Right LED will flash GREEN indicating readiness to include.
HomeTec Pro CFA3010: - S0/S2 Z-Wave Security

Value.label: Latch Torque
Value.Help: Torque of the latch is high 1.5nm/medium 1.2nm/low 1.0n

Value.label: Acoustic Feedback
Value.Help: 1.Acoustic signal is inactive / 2.Acoustic signal only at the beginning of the lock travel / 3.Acoustic signal when reaching the position of the event / 4.Acoustic signal when reaching the position Locked / 5.Acoustic signal when reaching each end position

Value.label: Travel Time
Value.Help: This parameter defines the travel path of the Lock 1.Automatic/Normal / 2.Multiple turns for one Open/Close action / 3.Travel from Tilted Position is turned on

Value.label: Motor Force
Value.Help: Motor force, when turning the lock

Value.label: Travel cycles latch
Value.Help: Counter how often latch was actuated

Value.label: Travel cycles unlocked
Value.Help: Counter, how often travel in „Unlocked“ direction

Value.label: Travel cycles locked
Value.Help: Counter, how often travel in „Locked“ direction
